content.p: We are a dedicated research group, based in the Department of Spanish, Portuguese and Latin American Studies but bringing together post-doctoral and postgraduate researchers working on Cuba from across the university. We run an annual seminar programme, and group tutorials which bring our postgraduate students together on a regular basis. We provide a physical base for the Hennessy Collection (a unique archive of books, newspapers, journals and other materials on, and from Cuba), which is also accessible to researchers from outside the university. The University of Nottingham Department of Spanish, Portuguese & Latin American Studies Nottingham, NG7 2RD telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 5800 email:Parvathi.Kumaraswami@nottingham.ac.uk YouTube Facebook
